words.source: H559 Qal wayyiqtol 3fp; KJV 'And the midwives said', ESV 'The midwives said', NASB 'The midwives said' — all agree
H3205 article + Piel participle fem pl abs; KJV/ESV/NASB all 'the midwives'
H413 preposition; KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to' — all agree
H3588 conjunction 'because, for'; KJV 'Because', ESV 'Because', NASB 'Because' — all agree
H3808 negative particle; KJV 'not', ESV 'not', NASB 'not' — all agree
H802 prep+article + noun fem pl abs; KJV 'as the Egyptian women', ESV 'like the Egyptian women', NASB 'like the Egyptian women' — all agree
H4713 article + gentillic adj fem pl abs; KJV 'the Egyptian women', ESV 'the Egyptian women', NASB 'the Egyptian women' — modifies 'women'
H5680 article + gentillic noun fem pl abs; KJV 'the Hebrew women', ESV 'the Hebrew women', NASB 'the Hebrew women' — all agree
H3588 conjunction; KJV 'for', ESV 'for', NASB 'for' — all agree
H2422 adjective fem pl abs 'lively, vigorous'; KJV 'lively' (DIVERGENT), ESV 'vigorous', NASB 'vigorous' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV uses archaic 'lively'
H2007 personal pronoun 3fp; KJV 'they are', ESV 'they are', NASB 'they are' — all agree
H2962 prep + adverb 'before'; KJV 'ere', ESV 'before', NASB 'before' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV uses archaic 'ere'
H935 Qal impf 3fs; KJV 'come in', ESV 'comes', NASB 'comes' — all agree
H413 prep + 3fp suffix; KJV 'unto them', ESV 'to them', NASB 'to them' — all agree
H3205 article + Piel participle fem sg abs; KJV 'the midwives', ESV 'the midwife', NASB 'the midwife' — ESV/NASB agree
H3205 conj + Qal perf 3cp; KJV 'they are delivered', ESV 'they give birth', NASB 'they give birth' — ESV/NASB agree; KJV uses passive
